Gorgeous, 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath luxury townhouse with 3 fireplaces and garage parking in sought-after Dupont/Logan Circle neighborhood within walking distance to business district, attractions, and night life. Whole Foods and Trader Joes are only 4 blocks away, as is nearest metro. Shopping and restaurants are nearby, too, and house is within walking distance of museums, Foggy Bottom and Georgetown.  Perfect for a family or professionals that want to enjoy spacious living in the heart of the city!  The home is 2,600 square feet on two levels with hardwood floors, crown molding, and incredible luxury upscale amenities throughout.  Hardwood floors were newly refinished just last year!  First floor includes marble entry foyer; living and dining rooms separated by open fireplace with arched entryways and Holly Hunt light fixture; new marble half bath with Waterworks fixtures; huge designer kitchen with Jenn-Air appliances and indoor grill; and, a very large family room with informal dining area that includes a fireplace and glass french doors that open to large patio overlooking garden/garage area.  Second floor includes an enormous master suite with 3 closets and lots of light, fireplace, and grand master bath with separate shower and jacuzzi tub; two additional bedrooms and second bathroom.  Other features and amenities included: alarm system; Direct TV cable with DVR's and premium channels in family room and master suite and a third cable box (without DVR) in one additional bedroom; high-end textured Ralph Lauren designer painting throughout; built-in intercom and stereo system in most rooms; and, lighting system that allows control of all interior lighting from single panel. House is 18-years old and covered by home warranty, so any issues that arise can be fixed quickly and professionally.  New dual-zone air conditioning system was installed in summer 2016, which allows separate control of temperature on upper and lower levels. Gorgeous, 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath luxury townhouse with 3 fireplaces and garage parking in sought-after Dupont/Logan Circle neighborhood within walking distance to business district, attractions, and night life. Whole Foods and Trader Joes are only 4 blocks away, as is nearest metro. Shopping and restaurants are nearby, too, and house is within walking distance of museums, Foggy Bottom and Georgetown.  Perfect for a family or professionals that want to enjoy spacious living in the heart of the city!  The home is 2,600 square feet on two levels with hardwood floors, crown molding, and incredible luxury upscale amenities throughout.  Hardwood floors were newly refinished just last year!  First floor includes marble entry foyer; living and dining rooms separated by open fireplace with arched entryways and Holly Hunt light fixture; new marble half bath with Waterworks fixtures; huge designer kitchen with Jenn-Air appliances and indoor grill; and, a very large family room with informal dining area that includes a fireplace and glass french doors that open to large patio overlooking garden/garage area.  Second floor includes an enormous master suite with 3 closets and lots of light, fireplace, and grand master bath with separate shower and jacuzzi tub; two additional bedrooms and second bathroom.  Other features and amenities included: alarm system; Direct TV cable with DVR's and premium channels in family room and master suite and a third cable box (without DVR) in one additional bedroom; high-end textured Ralph Lauren designer painting throughout; built-in intercom and stereo system in most rooms; and, lighting system that allows control of all interior lighting from single panel. New dual-zone air conditioning system was installed in summer 2016, which allows separate control of temperature on upper and lower levels. Spacious and gorgeous one bedroom one bathroom available for a lease-takeover at a pro-rated rate for January. The lease ends in August with options to renew with Management on your own terms. I moved into the apartment in September, but am MOVING TO CALIFORNIA for a new job! Ideally, I'd like to leave the apartment fully or partially furnished for the new tenant for a very reasonable price that we would negotiate. The building management, https://www.daroapartments.com, requires the potential tenant to complete and be approved through the Daro application process prior to taking occupancy. It was a straightforward process for me when I moved in a couple of months ago. The building is called Sedgwick Gardens and has 24hr concierge and mail services.  Rent is $1960 with all utilities included. My internet is around $40 or so.   Efficient kitchen with lovely built-in cabinets in the adjoining dining area. Windows for the dining and living room look out unto the landscaped courtyard. The living room and bedroom are very spacious with large windows and hardwood floors. Bathroom has lovely checkered tile. Apartment boasts three large closets and utility hooks. The closet across from the bathroom has enough room to fit a dresser. The bathroom has plenty of storage and a deep soaking tub. The apartment has radiator heating. The kitchen has a four burner gas stove.   The lobby is gorgeous and the building has historic charm. Laundry and gym are in the basement. Key fob security entry throughout. The building is 4 mins walking distance from the Cleveland Park metro (Red Line) as well as awesome food and shopping options. BEWARE: there is a Coldstone Creamery! Plenty of buses stop near the building. The neighborhood is close to Rockcreek park and is nestled nearby nature hikes. The Zoo is the next stop on the Red Line.   Cats are allowed (I believe there is a fee associated). Service or medically necessary dogs are allowed with necessary documentation. There is a parking lot in the back of the building but I believe there is a fee for that as well (I did not have a car).   I need to move from D.C. ASAP so I believe this is a wonderful space for a person who is motivated to move in very quickly. I look forward to hearing from you.

Gorgeous, 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath luxury townhouse with 3 fireplaces and garage parking in sought-after Dupont/Logan Circle neighborhood within walking distance to business district, attractions, and night life. Whole Foods and Trader Joes are only 4 blocks away, as is nearest metro. Shopping and restaurants are nearby, too, and house is within walking distance of museums, Foggy Bottom and Georgetown.  Perfect for a family or professionals that want to enjoy spacious living in the heart of the city!  The home is 2,600 square feet on two levels with hardwood floors, crown molding, and incredible luxury upscale amenities throughout.  Hardwood floors were newly refinished just last year!  First floor includes marble entry foyer; living and dining rooms separated by open fireplace with arched entryways and Holly Hunt light fixture; new marble half bath with Waterworks fixtures; huge designer kitchen with Jenn-Air appliances and indoor grill; and, a very large family room with informal dining area that includes a fireplace and glass french doors that open to large patio overlooking garden/garage area.  Second floor includes an enormous master suite with 3 closets and lots of light, fireplace, and grand master bath with separate shower and jacuzzi tub; two additional bedrooms and second bathroom.  Other features and amenities included: alarm system; Direct TV cable with DVR's and premium channels in family room and master suite and a third cable box (without DVR) in one additional bedroom; high-end textured Ralph Lauren designer painting throughout; built-in intercom and stereo system in most rooms; and, lighting system that allows control of all interior lighting from single panel. House is 18-years old and covered by home warranty, so any issues that arise can be fixed quickly and professionally.  New dual-zone air conditioning system was installed in summer 2016, which allows separate control of temperature on upper and lower levels. Gorgeous, 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath luxury townhouse with 3 fireplaces and garage parking in sought-after Dupont/Logan Circle neighborhood within walking distance to business district, attractions, and night life. The home is 2,600 square feet on two levels with hardwood floors, crown molding, and incredible luxury upscale amenities throughout.  Hardwood floors were newly refinished just last year!  First floor includes marble entry foyer; living and dining rooms separated by open fireplace with arched entryways and Holly Hunt light fixture; new marble half bath with Waterworks fixtures; huge designer kitchen with Jenn-Air appliances and indoor grill; and, a very large family room with informal dining area that includes a fireplace and glass french doors that open to large patio overlooking garden/garage area.  Second floor includes an enormous master suite with 3 closets and lots of light, fireplace, and grand master bath with separate shower and jacuzzi tub; two additional bedrooms and second bathroom.  Other features and amenities included: alarm system; Direct TV cable with DVR's and premium channels in family room and master suite and a third cable box (without DVR) in one additional bedroom; high-end textured Ralph Lauren designer painting throughout; built-in intercom and stereo system in most rooms; and, lighting system that allows control of all interior lighting from single panel. House is 18-years old and covered by home warranty, so any issues that arise can be fixed quickly and professionally.  New dual-zone air conditioning system was installed in summer 2016, which allows separate control of temperature on upper and lower levels. Gorgeous, 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath luxury townhouse with 3 fireplaces and garage parking in sought-after Dupont/Logan Circle neighborhood within walking distance to business district, attractions, and night life. Other features and amenities included: alarm system; Direct TV cable with DVR's and premium channels in family room and master suite and a third cable box (without DVR) in one additional bedroom; high-end textured Ralph Lauren designer painting throughout; built-in intercom and stereo system in most rooms; and, lighting system that allows control of all interior lighting from single panel. House is 18-years old and covered by home warranty, so any issues that arise can be fixed quickly and professionally.  New dual-zone air conditioning system was installed in summer 2016, which allows separate control of temperature on upper and lower levels. This is a small but nice one-bedroom apartment in Old Town Alexandria. The apartment has a nice-sized living, dining, and kitchen area, a good-sized bedroom, good storage, and a full bathroom. The kitchen has a dishwasher, disposal, and natural oak cabinets which provide good storage. There is also a washer-dryer in the apartment. The unit has oak floors throughout. The apartment has tenant-controlled year-round central air conditioning. It has an exterior entrance accessed through an adjoining patio. The patio is excellent for private barbecuing, etc.  Free cable high-speed wireless internet is included. All utilities except electricity are included.  There is excellent off-street and on-street parking. The tenant and guests can always park their cars.  It is a short two blocks to shops and restaurants (Faccia Luna, Southside 815, and District Taco) on South Washington Street. Other useful stores: Safeway, Balducci's (a gourmet grocery store with high-end prepared food carry-out), a CVS drug store, a very nearby coffee shop, Firehook Bakery (and coffee shop), an Ace hardware store, two banks, cleaners, two convenience stores, etc. are are also within easy walking distance.  Metro is within walking distance (if you are a walker - it is about a 20 minute walk); excellent connecting bus service is two blocks away on Washington St.  No pets please.  We are a family owned and operated hands-on apartment business. We have been offering quality apartments with hands-on owner-provided maintenance in this part of old town for more more than than forty years. We have 55 one or two bedroom units with a variety of floor plans. On average, we have one of these units available for rent each month. Our rents range from a low of $1350 (English Basement one bedroom) to $1525 (one bedroom) to $2100 (2 bedroom), with downward variations due to size and floor plan. The area is one of inter-mingled townhouses and small garden-style apartment buildings. Our Units are in a contiguous three-block area on the 800 and 900 blocks of Jefferson, South Alfred, and Church Streets in the southern part of Old Town Alexandria.
